Properties.ProtectedString:
function getRandomValue(table) return table[math.random(#table)] end
HATS = { 48474294, -- Pinktastic Hair 51353039, -- Bloxxer Cap 18174901, -- Guardia in Exile 30200035, 48474313, 19027209, 16630147, 19398258, 16412796 }
HEADS = { 6340213, 6340101, 6340227, }
FACES = { "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=7074749", -- Chill "rbxasset://textures/face.png", "rbxasset://textures/face.png", }
SHIRTS = { "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=8561740", -- Guest Shirt "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=3039068", }
TEESHIRTS = { "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1028594", -- Bloxxer }
SKIN_COLORS = { BrickColor.new("Bright yellow"), BrickColor.new("Pastel brown"), BrickColor.new("Institutional white") }
function getDummy()
local dummy = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(124120704):GetChildren()[1]
local skinColor = getRandomValue(SKIN_COLORS) dummy.Head.BrickColor = skinColor dummy["Right Arm"].BrickColor = skinColor dummy["Left Arm"].BrickColor = skinColor
if math.random() > .7 then dummy.Head.Mesh:Destroy() game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(getRandomValue(HEADS)):GetChildren()[1].Parent = dummy.Head end
game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(dummy, 30) dummy.Humanoid.Died:connect(function() dummy:Destroy() end)
dummy.Torso.BrickColor = BrickColor.random() dummy["Left Leg"].BrickColor = BrickColor.random() dummy["Right Leg"].BrickColor = BrickColor.random()
local shirtTest = math.random() if shirtTest < .5 then dummy.Torso.Decal.Texture = getRandomValue(TEESHIRTS) elseif shirtTest < .7 then dummy.Shirt.ShirtTemplate = getRandomValue(SHIRTS) end
dummy.Head.face.Texture = getRandomValue(FACES) dummy.Name = script.Parent.Parent.Name .. "'s Fan"
return dummy end
Tool = script.Parent
function getFans() local count = 0 for _, child in pairs(Workspace:GetChildren()) do if child.Name == Tool.Parent.Name .. "'s Fan" then count = count + 1 end end return count end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
Tool.Handle.Boing:play() Tool.Handle.Transparency = .5
for i = 1, 6 do if getFans() <= 12 then local dummy = getDummy() dummy.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = math.random(11, 15) dummy.Target.Value = script.Parent.Parent.Torso dummy.Parent = Workspace dummy.Head:MakeJoints() wait() if math.random() > .2 then game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(getRandomValue(HATS)):GetChildren()[1].Parent = dummy end
local torsoPosition = script.Parent.Parent.Torso.Position
local x = torsoPosition.X local z = torsoPosition.Z dummy:MoveTo(Vector3.new(math.random(x - 10, x + 10), torsoPosition.Y, math.random(z - 10, z + 10))) end end
wait(14)
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(shieldsDown)

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
wait(15) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
